answerText: aquaporins[10] Aquaporin regulates the flow of water across this barrier that separates the interior of a cell from its outside environment. This lipid bilayer is described by the fluid mosaic model.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Harvard A and Virginia B | 4 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Peter Agre won the 2003 Nobel Prize in Chemistry for discovering these proteins. For 10 points each: [10] Name these proteins that regulate the flow of water into a cell. The NPA motif is thought to help rotate water molecules within these protein.
